articles.content: In three matches, Deepak Hooda got to bat in two innings where he could just score 19 runs. Team India will want to rethink using him as a finisher.

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Shastri's straightforward verdict on Virat Kohli getting 'monkey off his back' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shastri said Kohli will feel lighter mentally, now that the pressure of scoring a ton no longer exists. He pointed out how the mercurial player looked his usual self during the last 40 of his innings. | Cricket
articles.content: Even Virat Kohli was "pleasantly surprised" when he ended the wait for his 71st international ton with his first century in the T20 format in the Asia Cup 2022. The star batter reached the elusive th… [+3080 chars]

articles.author: Deivarayan Muthu
articles.title: Shaw 'back on track' with much-awaited hundred - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Says he worked hard on his fitness during the off-season and started batting only 12 days before the Duleep Trophy
articles.content: NewsSays he worked hard on his fitness during the off-season and started batting only 12 days before the Duleep Trophy
